articles.author: Cincinnati, Mark Curnutte, Cincinnati
articles.title: Supreme Court justice is last hope as paraplegic boy's stepdad heads toward deportation
articles.description: Lawyers make a last-ditch plea to Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan as Yancarlos Mendez is moved to a Louisiana immigration detention site.

articles.author: Tawnell D. Hobbs
articles.title: Schools Take Zero-Tolerance Approach to Threats
articles.description: After the Parkland shooting, schools around the country are taking a zero-tolerance stance on threats and involving law enforcement more frequently for matters that they used to handle on their own.
